statements: SELECT year, crop_type, yield_per_acre FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE average_rainfall > 100;
SELECT crop_type, AVG(yield_per_acre) as avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_type;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT year, crop_type, yield_per_acre FROM crop_yield_data WHERE soil_ph_level BETWEEN 6.5 AND 7.5;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT crop_type, yield_per_acre FROM crop_yield_data WHERE average_rainfall > 50 ORDER BY yield_per_acre DESC;
SELECT year, crop_type, average_rainfall FROM crop_yield_data WHERE soil_ph_level BETWEEN 4.5 AND 6.5;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_per_acre > 50;
SELECT AVG(yield_per_acre), MAX(average_rainfall) FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY year HAVING AVG(yield_per_acre) > 40;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE location='California';
SELECT crop_name, yield_value FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year=2021;
SELECT crop_name, location FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, previous_crop, rotation_cycle FROM crop_rotation WHERE suggested_crop='Soybean';
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY crop_name DESC, yield_value ASC
SELECT crop_name, AVG(yield_value) as avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY avg_yield DESC
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_yield_data WHERE location = 'California' AND year > 2018
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_cycle > 3 GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_name IN ('Wheat', 'Corn') ORDER BY location, year DESC
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM fields JOIN crops ON fields.crop_id = crops.crop_id;
SELECT field_name, yield, yield_amount FROM fields WHERE yield_year = 2021;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crops ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT rotation_id, field_name, previous_crop_id, current_crop_id FROM crop_rotation JOIN fields ON crop_rotation.field_id = fields.field_id;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crops WHERE yield > 100;
SELECT fields.field_name, crops.crop_name, fields.yield_amount FROM fields JOIN crops ON fields.crop_id = crops.crop_id;

SELECT crop_rotation.rotation_id, fields.field_name, crops.crop_name, previous.crop_name AS previous_crop, current.crop_name AS current_crop FROM crop_rotation JOIN fields ON crop_rotation.field_id = fields.field_id JOIN crops ON fields.crop_id = crops.crop_id JOIN crops AS previous ON crop_rotation.previous_crop_id = previous.crop_id JOIN crops AS current ON crop_rotation.current_crop_id = current.crop_id;

SELECT fields.field_name, sum(fields.yield_amount) AS total_yield, crops.crop_name FROM fields JOIN crops ON fields.crop_id = crops.crop_id GROUP BY fields.field_name, crops.crop_name ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM crop_species WHERE optimal_climate = 'Tropical' AND soil_type = 'Sandy';
SELECT date, temperature, precipitation FROM historical_weather WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT year, crop_name, yield_amount, location FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE location = 'California' AND crop_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species_name, optimal_climate, soil_type FROM crop_species WHERE optimal_climate IN ('Tropical', 'Temperate') ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_one = 'Corn' OR crop_two = 'Wheat' OR crop_three = 'Soybean';
SELECT date, location, temperature, precipitation FROM historical_weather WHERE temperature > 30 AND precipitation < 10 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2020
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_season DESC
SELECT recommended_crop_name, recommended_season FROM crop_recommendation WHERE soil_id = 1
SELECT soil_name, soil_texture FROM soil_type
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id = 1 AND year = 2021;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT rotation_id, crop_id, previous_crop_id, next_crop_id, rotation_season FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_id DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommended_crop_name, recommended_season FROM crop_recommendation WHERE soil_id = 2;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, yield_kg_per_hectare FROM crop JOIN crop_yield_data ON crop.crop_id = crop_yield_data.crop_id ORDER BY yield_kg_per_hectare DESC;
